# BGmisc

<!-- badges: start -->
[![CRAN
version](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/BGmisc)](https://cran.r-project.org/package=BGmisc)

[![.github/workflows/draft-pdf.yml](https://github.com/R-Computing-Lab/BGmisc/actions/workflows/draft-pdf.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/R-Computing-Lab/BGmisc/actions/workflows/draft-pdf.yml)
<!-- badges: end -->

BGmisc contains many functions useful for behavior genetics, including plots and classic formulae.

## Installation

You can install the development version of BGmisc from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("R-Computing-Lab/BGmisc")
```

## Contributing
Contributions to the BGmisc project are welcome. Please submit issues and pull requests on the GitHub repository. For support, please use the GitHub issues page.
